install.name: Content - GoTop
install.author: CS
install.copyright: This plugin is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: Content-Plugin to show a 'go to top of page' text- or image-link. Activate this plugin and insert {gotop} in the content/article where the link shall appear. (requires the browser's Javascript to be activated!)

param.name: Limg
param.label: Link image
param.description: Choose an image which will be displayd instead of the 'link text' below. (place an own link-image in: [/images/M_images/].

param.name: Ltxt
param.label: Link Text
param.description: Enter the text to be shown for the link. This text will only appear if the 'link image' (above) is deselected!

param.name: Lwidth
param.label: Link width (+CSS)
param.description: Enter width value and unit (px, pt, %, etc.) for the link area. In this area the mouse will appear as pointer/hand when moved over. Behind this 'width'-value additional CSS may be inserted (e.g. '; height: 2em; text-align: right; font-weight: bold;' etc.).

param.name: Ltitle
param.label: Link title
param.description: Enter the text to be shown as popup/tooltip (title) text when moving the mouse over the link.

param.name: Lhrabove
param.label: Horizontal Line (above)
param.description: State if a horizontal Line shall be placed above the 'go top' link (e.g. as separator).

param.name: Lhrbelow
param.label: Horizontal Line (below)
param.description: State if a horizontal Line shall be placed below the 'go top' link (e.g. as separator).

param.name: Lprint
param.label: Print
param.description: Choose whether the gotop-link shall appear on printed pages or not.
